sub_title: Driving Global Growth for Tech Startups üöÄ International Business Development ‚ô¶ Expansion & Go-To-Market Strategy  ‚ô¶ Lean Entrepreneurship & Project Management ‚ô¶ Innovation
summary:
Are you looking for an international business developer with a proven track record of accelerating growth for startups in the tech industry? Look no further. With nearly 5 years of experience in leveraging market research and consumer insights, I've delivered sales and profit targets for startups across Europe. I'm known for my goal-oriented, self-motivated leadership style and ability to bridge the gap between business development operations and profitability objectives.

My extensive experience includes pursuing new B2B and B2C business opportunities, collaborating with cross-functional teams to develop and implement go-to-market strategies, and expanding and upselling existing relationships with key partners. As a multilingual professional fluent in English, Italian, German, and French, I can effectively prospect companies in 10 European countries.

During the first COVID-19 lockdown, I enrolled in the Lean Start-up Program organized by Peekaboo, an Italian pre-accelerator, and acquired a new set of skills in Lean Entrepreneurship and Project Management to complement my strong sales, business development, and negotiation skills.

Looking for a dynamic, results-driven professional who can help your business break into new markets and achieve sustainable growth? Let's connect and discuss how I can add value to your team.
